title: How I Implemented Light/Dark Mode
content: To add light/dark mode, I created a toggle button that switches a class on the body. I then created the js code and updated it, beofre adding all the required tags in the correct places

title: Building a Dynamic Blog with JavaScript
content: I used JavaScript's fetch API feauture to load blog posts from a JSON file and inject them into the DOM. I then wrote all the code and added the right tags in the right places.
